name: fclose
warnings: Using an invalid handle will crash your server! Get a valid handle by using fopen or ftemp.
description: Closes a file. Files should always be closed when the script no longer needs them (after reading/writing).

params_body.name: File:handle
params_body.description: The file handle to close. Returned by fopen.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The file could not be closed. It may already be closed.
related_fn:
fopen: Open a file.
 fclose: Close a file.
 ftemp: Create a temporary file stream.
 fremove: Remove a file.
 fwrite: Write to a file.
 fread: Read a file.
 fputchar: Put a character in a file.
 fgetchar: Get a character from a file.
 fblockwrite: Write blocks of data into a file.
 fblockread: Read blocks of data from a file.
 fseek: Jump to a specific character in a file.
 flength: Get the file length.
 fexist: Check, if a file exists.
 fmatch: Check, if patterns with a file name matches.
